Articles.Content:
Setup: Two or more players orbit a craft each around the Mun.

Play: Determine who goes first. That player reduces their orbit by however much they wish. The next player has to reduce their orbit and it must be lower than the previous player.

Win: The last player to have an orbiting craft that has not crashed wins.

Anybody want to expand this idea? Could be a lot of fun. Also. a cooler name for the sport?

With love to my fellow kerbinauts,

Pete.
